## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Code is properly formatted (black, isort)
- [ ] No linting errors (flake8, mypy)
- [ ] No security issues (bandit)
- [ ] Code is properly commented where needed

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests provide adequate coverage
- [ ] Tests cover edge cases and error conditions
- [ ] Performance tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Hardware tests pass (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] Code changes are reflected in documentation
- [ ] Public API changes are documented
- [ ] Examples are updated if needed
- [ ] Docstrings follow project conventions

### Review
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Ready for code review
- [ ] Appropriate reviewers assigned
- [ ] Linked to relevant issues/projects
